name: kk Youtube Video
author: Kamal Khan

sections.description:
Easily embed youtube videos in your post or page. This plugin will allow you to search for any video within wordpress, choose a video, play it and insert the video anywhere in your post or page. Now you dont need to go to youtube.com and search for your favourite videos.

  1. TinyMCE button so that you dont need to enter the shortcode manually into the editor.

  2. Search, play and select videos from the editor page.

  3. Adjust width and height for the embedded player.

  4. Don’t worry for going outside wordpress to find videos. Everything is here.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the folder ‘kk-youtube-video’ found inside the zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Navigate to your post editor and find the tiny Youtube Button at the top of the tinyMCE Editor.
sections.faq: Hop on to the plugin page, send me a comment and I will be more happy to assist you.
sections.changelog:
0.2

  • Fixed js issue for inline popup

0.1

  • Plugin available at wordpress repository
